# pruneR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of pruneR is to reduce the size of modeling objects that are saved to disk. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of pruneR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("pruneR")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jyuu/pruneR")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(pruneR)
## basic example code
```
